attributes.action: Extend the transition period due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Parliament should act to immediately force the government to seek an extension to the current transition period of 6 months or more.
attributes.background: The high probability of a no deal Brexit is compounding the economic woes of our nation. We need every ounce of our strength to fight this crisis and now is not the time for adding additional stress to our system. We need all trade routes open for: Food, medical supplies and eventually, a vaccine.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300412

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
